articles.description: According to the recent BCN report, Sony has overtaken Canon for sales of mirrorless cameras in Japanese retailers
articles.content: It's official  Sony has managed to overtake Canon when it comes to sales for mirrorless cameras. In 2019 Sony's market share was 22.7% compared to Canon's healthy 31.6% share. However, Canon has seen… [+2269 chars]
